channel.title: Help i Messed up my server :\
channel.description:
ok so i wanted to add dclaws dplate and all that shit customs godswords etc and it was all going good until i tried to add stat bonuses and stuff so i changed the bonuses bin->data->items->items after i compiled i got this error that idk how to fix :( can some 1 please help me? thanks (i cant start up the server)
Starting server on port: 43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at DavidScape.world.items.Items.loadItemList(Items.java:396) at DavidScape.world.items.Items.<init>(Items.java:34) at DavidScape.Engine.<init>(Engine.java:154) at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:53) Press any key to continue . . . :confused:
------EDIT-------- well i fixed this problem but now i have a new 1 :'(
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Native Method) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(PlainSocketImpl.java:359) at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(ServerSocket.java:319) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:185) at java.net.ServerSocket.<init>(ServerSocket.java:141) at DavidScape.net.SocketListener.<init>(SocketListener.java:36) at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:43) Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Help i Messed up my server :\
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

Well i don’t know but always make Backups before making something in my opinion

this is what i wrote for Dclaws
item = 3101 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 12000 12000 12000 100 100 -4 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 130 0

the numbers dont fit on 1 line:\ but in notepad their all in 1 line >.>
what do i do to not get the error?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 24, 2009, 02:57:19 pm[/size][hr]BUMP…

No, instead of doing space with espace, do space with the button Shift. You see the button ? Well for each space, do that.

item.title: Help i Messed up my server :\
item.dc:creator: @Maximum_ZxZ Maximum ZxZ
item.description:
@Maximum_ZxZ wrote:

[quote=“G0dz Tank, post:1, topic:297457”]ok so i wanted to add dclaws dplate and all that shit customs godswords etc and it was all going good until i tried to add stat bonuses and stuff so i changed the bonuses bin->data->items->items after i compiled i got this error that idk how to fix can some 1 please help me? thanks (i cant start up the server)

Starting server on port: 43594
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17
at DavidScape.world.items.Items.loadItemList(Items.java:396)
at DavidScape.world.items.Items.(Items.java:34)
at DavidScape.Engine.(Engine.java:154)
at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:53)
Press any key to continue . . .
[/quote]

This error is because you didn’t do the button Shift while you coded your stats bonus.

Read full topic
